A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film worked\, with a believable plot line and snarky dialog and slapstick moments that harken back to the original trilogy. This film happens in the nuance\, with complicated problems\, soulful characters\, kid-friendly peripherals\, and that classic Star Wars intercutting between different plot lines (often juxtaposed to emphasize their stark contrasts with one another and establish a mid-story rhythm). Oh yes\, and John Williams is back with a phenomenal\, perfectly pronounced score\, replete with a bounty of old cues that blend seamlessly back and forth\, dancing between old and new.
